products.title: Fiji, Bark - Roman Blind
products.description: The fiji in distinct bark is sure to add an elegant finish to any room in the home. This bronze-hued blind, formed from a voile-like cloth and silky thread, oozes sophisticated chic with its delicately textured finish and alluring metallic tone. Transform a plain chocolate brown or magnolia palette in your living room by blending the striking bark with unique shading and bronzed tones, including copper accessories and complementing burnished oddments to create a stylish and urban finish with a current metallic infusion.

products.title: Fiji, Green - Roman Blind
products.description: Rejuvenate and energise your home by including the fiji in a refreshing, muted lime green tone. This sleek blind is made from a voile-like fabric and silky, metallic-infused thread to form an elegant finish with vibrant colour and subtle texture. Revive a basic white bathroom or sun lounge with sprightly tones of lime, olive, and avocado greens for a stylish lift and a boost of stimulating colour, combining with metallic materials and accessories to elaborate the shimmering blind and create elegant continuity.

products.title: Fiji, Mocha - Roman Blind
products.description: Generate an elegant and impressive style with the fiji range in a luscious mocha shade, combining sheer fabrics with metallic infused thread. This luxurious blend forms a distinct blind with delicate texture, producing a smart and sophisticated finish. Combine the mocha with warm and inviting neutral tones like ivory, biscuit, and oatmeal, adding depth and cosiness with layered linens in alike shades.

products.title: Fiji, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: Produce an elegant and stylish look with the fiji in natural in a beguiling golden shade, where silky thread meets voile-like fabric for a distinctive appearance and added charisma. This delicate fusion produces a sophisticated blind with subtle texture for a touch of tasteful character. Combine the natural with ivories, golds, and honeyed tones for a sleek aesthetic, adding comforting, sumptuous linens and sheer fabrics for a refined edge.

products.title: Pavillion, Duckegg - Roman Blind
products.description: Cream and blue always makes for a striking pairing, and the pavillion in duckegg is no different. Intricate stitching creates a sectioned pattern interjected with rectangular shapes and the effect is both stylish and attractive. Use the duckegg to create a classic look in your living room. Keep creams and pale biscuits as the base colour scheme, using blues to accent throughout. Opt for plush fabrics for a luxurious feel, adding plenty of scatter cushions as well as wall art and ornaments.

products.title: Acacia, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: For a distinct dcor scheme with lavish fabric and dazzling colour, include the splendid acacia in natural, with its plush embellishment and quilted texture, and where a charming foliage display is formed from opulent gold and emerald threads. The sophisticated cream background provides refined style and elegance. Combine the natural with an assortment of layered fabrics and luxuriously embellished details for a welcoming and affluent look.

products.title: Pavillion, Ochre - Roman Blind
products.description: Gold and silver combined will always make for glamorous look and the pavillion ochre brings a sense of gentle sophistication wherever it goes. The intricate stitching of the eye-catching pattern blends the two shades to create a beautifully stylish roman blind. The ochre would look just gorgeous in the living room, where surrounding it with rich cream walls and sofas will allow it to stand out. Add throws and scatter cushions in gold and silver tones, and go for medium woods throughout for contrast.

products.title: Tweety, Duckegg - Roman Blind
products.description: The pretty pastel shades of the tweety duckegg offer a cheery and summery feel that will last all year long. Think minty turquoise and pale candy pink matched with the occasional petrol blue and deep magenta for a blind that's full of life and colour. Provide a white wall with a delicious colour pop in a child's room or spare bedroom. Use the pale turquoise in the blind as the key colour for the rest of the room, coordinating it with bedding, rugs, and other accessories, and bringing in other elements from the blinds to accent.

products.title: Tweety, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: You'll love the cool, jaded tones of the tweety in charcoal. Its contemporary bird and tree patterning plays host to a muted charcoal grey, as well as understated tones of sage green, ice blue, indigo purple, mustard yellow, and creamy biscuit. What more could you want?Hang the charcoal in the living room or kitchen, where the sweet birds will sit pretty and add character to the space. Choose an accent colour from the blind and use it throughout the room to bring the tone to life.

products.title: Tweety, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: In sweet and cheery shades of sunny orange, lemon yellow, cool aqua, and many more, the tweety natural is a prettily formed roman blind with as much character as colour. Adorable birds sit atop neutrally toned branches, giving a contemporary yet natural look. Use the natural as a key design element in a cutely kitsch kitchen, surrounding it with natural woods and creamy units. Use your favourite colours from the fabric to decide on accenting colours to be carried across by utensils, accessories, and the like.

products.title: Castelli, Duckegg - Roman Blind
products.description: Sleek and sophisticated, the castelli in duck egg just oozes sophistication. Displaying classic thin stripes, in duck egg and rich cream, this roman blind gives a timeless look of class and style that will add a feeling of luxury to any home. Give the duck egg a home in a serenely dcorated living room, surrounded by pale duck egg walls and cream furnishings. Opt for plushly textured fabrics, such as chenille and soft wool, to add depth and cosiness to the room.

products.title: Castelli, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: The castelli natural is a beautiful shade of golden cream, with a luxurious chenille-like texture bringing depth of colour and character to the fabric. The various stitching types make this more than a flat fabric blind, offering a feeling of luxe class you'll find irresistible. Add the natural to any room in need of a touch of lush comfort, and surround it with contrasting rich tones, such as plum or chocolate, perhaps as part of a feature wall.

products.title: Castelli, Earth - Roman Blind
products.description: Think elegant stripes drawn in equally classy shades of stone grey and antique cream, and you've got the castelli in earth. Less is always more, as they say, and this timeless roman blind certainly proves the point. Include the earth in a sumptuous yet sophisticated living room or dining room, where creams and greys abound, and plush fabrics rule the roost. Keep the colour scheme classic and understated, without loud colours - this beautiful look will speak for itself every time.

products.title: Barbican Charcoal Roman Blind
products.description: The barbican range comes in 4 different colour variations. Add more dimension to your decor with thebeautiful striped pattern. The barbican charcoal roman blind will be an elegant addition to your room. Product id: db-arom0817 fabric colour: charcoal material: 60% polyester 30% cotton 10% linen headrail: white metal headrail control type: sidewinder chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes barbican charcoal roman blind in grey.

products.title: Windsor, Antique - Roman Blind
products.description: Camel gold, with gentle ribbing and a silky, flawless finish, the windsor antique offers quite an aesthetic. The smooth fabric blends beautifully into roman folds, stabilised with sewn in batons to prevent sagging and ensure that your blind will last you for years. Opt for a striking look in your master bedroom by setting the antique with a jet black shade. Pattern the walls with a gold and cream damask wallpaper, with hints of black, and choose black bedlinen and rugs, burnished with the occasional gold accent.

products.title: Kensington, Stone - Roman Blind
products.description: Adorned with colourful fruits, the kensington in stone is sure to whet the appetite. The grey-toned white of the background provides a serene base that allows the deep blue, red, and coral hues to truly pop, offering a gorgeously understated sensation of colour. This array of fruit surely belongs in the kitchen or dining room. Place against a feature wall in deep blue or burnt orange and use the same colours to accent with accessories throughout the rest of the room.

products.title: Nightshade, Blue Grey Grain - Day Night Blind
products.description: With its beautifully textured look, in blueish slate and delicate silver, the nightshade blue grey grain is contemporary, stylish, and unusual. Add to this the hidden controls, sleek rail cassette, and sliding strips for light and privacy control, and you have the ultimate luxury blind. Treat the blue grey grain as a standalone window feature, setting it against pure white walls in the kitchen. Stick to white for the tiling and choose chrome units, accenting throughout with matching greys and whites for the most modernly chic look.

products.title: Nightshade, Mist - Day Night Blind
products.description: In pale, silvery white, the nightshade in mist offers an opaque double layering of heavily stitched fabric, which plays host to the sliding strips of translucent netting. For an easy, streamlined effect, the controls are neatly hidden from view in the blind's rail cassette, from which the blind hangs neatly and easily. Use the mist to complement a petrol blue and soft grey colour scheme in a contemporary living room, where it will look striking against a blue feature wall.

products.title: Abstract, Powder - Roman Blind
products.description: The pretty, colourful patterning of the abstract in powder displays an artistic style of dcor that will be welcome in any kind of home. Combining mustard yellows with deep teals and cool ice blues, the look is a peaceful and serene one. Surround the powder with similar cool blues, including pale aqua walls, and ice white tones to enhance the light and airy look of the blind. Go for contemporary furniture, with sleek clean lines, warming the room up a little with an array of different textures and fabrics.

products.title: Jungle, Pebble - Roman Blind
products.description: The jungle pebble blends fun and exciting illustration with similarly eye-catching colouring. A softly toned grey forms the canvas of the piece, with teal blue, apple green, mustard oranges, and candy pinks shading the pretty jungle imagery. The result? An unusual yet irresistible window covering. A child's bedroom or playroom would be an obvious choice for the pebble, where surrounding it with similarly fun shades will surely stir your child's imagination.

products.title: Honesty, Ochre - Roman Blind
products.description: Colourful and charming, the honesty in ochre just oozes personality. Displaying a contemporary foliage print, in ice blues and burnt browns, all on a tangy brown background, this roman blind gives a stylish look to any home. Give the ochre a home in a neutrally dcorated guest bedroom, surrounded by soft ice blue walls and biscuit coloured soft furnishings. Choose plenty of textured fabrics for a feeling of warmth and cosiness in the room that those staying in it will just love.

products.title: Abstract, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: Abstract is as abstract does, and in natural, it just lives and breathes beautiful, ethereal patterning. Almost navy mixes with muted mustard yellow, giving life to creamy greys and washed out maroons. The outcome? A softly pretty roman blind full of character. Hang the natural in the hallway or landing to add just a hint of colour to an often neglected area of the home. Surround with neutral walls, but accent with similar blues or reds in the form of wall art and ornaments.

products.title: Honeycomb, Stone - Roman Blind
products.description: Featuring a subtle honeycomb patterning, filled with abstract style daisies in the centre, the honeycomb in stone blends soft grey tones with off-white and sunny yellow. The look is fairly contemporary but will work well in any setting where a tempered, muted feel is on the cards. For a look that will be bang on trend, hang the stone against a soft yellow wall in a study or guest bedroom, where your room will be fashion forward with a grey and yellow colour scheme.

products.title: Honeycomb, Teal - Roman Blind
products.description: To give a big pop of colour to your home, consider the honeycomb in teal. This rich canvas of dark and light teal tones, with honeycomb shapes filled with daisies, offers a strikingly abstract look that you're sure to love. Use the teal to liven up a bright white study or home office, adding a little inspiration as you get down to work. Accent the colours of the fabric with matching teal hues in the form of ornaments and oddments, going for ice white and contemporary furniture.

products.title: Hollihocks, Candy - Roman Blind
products.description: The hollihocks in candy gives the impression of a country cottage garden in midsummer bloom. Bold, sugar-sweet shades of pink and coral make its name apt, and the gentle lavender and green tones offset them perfectly. The candy deserves pride of place in a cheerily toned kitchen, where it's sure to brighten up mealtimes. Hang amidst cream or off-white units, pale apple green walls, and bright coral accessories.

products.title: Capri, Yellow - Roman Blind
products.description: If you're looking for something bold, bright, and just a little bit tropical, then you'll find it in the capri yellow, where a sunny yellow forms the base for gorgeous fuchsias, pale sky blues, and lush lime greens, tempered by the occasional gentle taupe, charcoal black, and soft white. Give the yellow pride of place by hanging in a contemporary living room. Keep the bases of the room, such as the walls and floor, neutral and unobtrusive, adding pale grey or taupe sofas, and accessorise with one or two of the brighter tones from the blind.

products.title: Phoebe, Summer - Roman Blind
products.description: The phoebe in summer is a quirky rainbow of colour, offering an abstract foliage print in pastel shades of lilac, aqua, pink, and green, accented by deeper hues of black, blue, and grey. The overall look is one of funky character and certainly one for colour lovers. Hang the summer in a studio or creative area, where the variety of colours will leave you inspired. Don't be afraid of adding more colour throughout the rest of the room either, opting for paler shades found in the blind, such as pale aqua.

products.title: Phoebe, Aqua - Roman Blind
products.description: Blues are the stars of the show in the phoebe aqua, but they're not on their own. Cobalt, sky, and aqua blues are mixed with fun shades of apple green, lemon yellow, and coral orange, resulting in a fun and eclectic look sure to liven up any living space. Add the aqua to a room in need of some inspiration, such as a plain utility room or hallway, or a creative space such as an art studio or playroom.

products.title: Phoebe, Rainbow - Roman Blind
products.description: Once the phoebe rainbow is on display, there's no missing it. A contemporary and somewhat abstract floral pattern displays rose pinks, sunshine yellows, and citrus oranges, as well as apple greens and petrol blues, forming a plethora of colour across the canvas. Use the rainbow in any room where you want to make a statement. A room with plenty of sunlight will complement this blind best, and surround it with similar sunny yellow and oranges for a cheery, uplifting look.
